entity.entitySummary: This table stores information about a party contributing to a vegetation plot.
entity.entityDescription: This table serves as an interesection entity used to 'link' a party with a specific vegetation plot. During the working group meeting at NCEAS in Septemeber, the 'institution' attribute was added. This attribute will hold the name of the institution at which the contributor worked during the collection of the plot. The addition of this attribute replaced the link between the plotContributor table and the address table.
